014package org.jdbi.v3.core.codec;
015
016import java.lang.reflect.Type;
017import java.util.Collection;
018import java.util.Collections;
019import java.util.HashMap;
020import java.util.Map;
021import java.util.Optional;
022import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap;
023import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentMap;
024import java.util.function.Function;
025
026import javax.annotation.concurrent.NotThreadSafe;
027import javax.annotation.concurrent.ThreadSafe;
028
029import org.jdbi.v3.core.argument.Argument;
030import org.jdbi.v3.core.argument.QualifiedArgumentFactory;
031import org.jdbi.v3.core.config.ConfigRegistry;
032import org.jdbi.v3.core.generic.GenericType;
033import org.jdbi.v3.core.mapper.ColumnMapper;
034import org.jdbi.v3.core.mapper.QualifiedColumnMapperFactory;
035import org.jdbi.v3.core.qualifier.QualifiedType;
036import org.jdbi.v3.meta.Alpha;
037
038import static java.util.Objects.requireNonNull;
039
040/**
041 * CodecFactory provides column mappers and arguments for bidirectional mapping types to database columns.
042 * <p>
043 * This class is immutable and thread safe.
044 * <p><i>Alpha: this class as public API is redundant with the existing way of managing mappers: we should try to combine them
045 * to make the new public API as small as possible</i>
046 */
047@ThreadSafe
048@Alpha
049public class CodecFactory implements QualifiedColumnMapperFactory, QualifiedArgumentFactory.Preparable {
050
051    /**
052     * Map of all known codecs in this factory.
053     *
054     * ALPHA: the fact that this is a Map from type to Codec makes it hard to implement Codecs that target wildcard
055     * or varying types e.g. mapping both {@code Sub<T>} and {@code Super<T>} with one codec.
056     * It might be nice to re-imagine this as itself a JdbiPlugin and have it do all registration through the existing flows.
057     */
058    protected final ConcurrentMap<QualifiedType<?>, Codec<?>> codecMap = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
059
060    /**
061     * Returns a builder for fluent API.
062     */
063    public static Builder builder() {
064        return new Builder(CodecFactory::new);
065    }
066
067    public static CodecFactory forSingleCodec(QualifiedType<?> type, Codec<?> codec) {
068        return new CodecFactory(Collections.singletonMap(type, codec));
069    }
070
071    /**
072     * Create a new CodecFactory.
073     */
074    public CodecFactory(final Map<QualifiedType<?>, Codec<?>> codecMap) {
075        requireNonNull(codecMap, "codecMap is null");
076        this.codecMap.putAll(codecMap);
077    }
078
079    @Override
080    public final Optional<Function<Object, Argument>> prepare(final QualifiedType<?> type, final ConfigRegistry config) {
081        return Optional.of(type).map(this::resolveType).map(key -> (Function<Object, Argument>) key.getArgumentFunction(config));
082    }
083
084    @Override
085    public final Collection<QualifiedType<?>> prePreparedTypes() {
086        return codecMap.keySet();
087    }
088
089    @Override
090    public final Optional<Argument> build(final QualifiedType<?> type, final Object value, final ConfigRegistry config) {
091        return prepare(type, config).map(f -> f.apply(value));
092    }
093
094    @Override
095    public final Optional<ColumnMapper<?>> build(final QualifiedType<?> type, final ConfigRegistry config) {
096        return Optional.of(type).map(this::resolveType).map(c -> c.getColumnMapper(config));
097    }
098
099    /**
100     * Extension point for type resolution.
101     *
102     * @param qualifiedType Requested type
103     * @return A {@link Codec} for the requested type or null if no codec is suitable.
104     */
105    protected Codec<?> resolveType(QualifiedType<?> qualifiedType) {
106        return codecMap.get(qualifiedType);
107    }
108
109    /**
110     * Fluent Builder for {@link CodecFactory}.
111     */
112    @NotThreadSafe
113    @Alpha
114    public static final class Builder {
115
116        private final Map<QualifiedType<?>, Codec<?>> codecMap = new HashMap<>();
117
118        private final Function<Map<QualifiedType<?>, Codec<?>>, CodecFactory> factory;
119
120        public Builder(Function<Map<QualifiedType<?>, Codec<?>>, CodecFactory> factory) {
121            this.factory = requireNonNull(factory, "factory is null");
122        }
123
124        /**
125         * Add a codec for a {@link QualifiedType}.
126         */
127        public Builder addCodec(final QualifiedType<?> type, final Codec<?> codec) {
128            requireNonNull(type, "type is null");
129            requireNonNull(codec, "codec is null");
130            codecMap.put(type, codec);
131
132            return this;
133        }
134
135        /**
136         * Add a codec for a {@link Type}.
137         */
138        public Builder addCodec(final Type type, final Codec<?> codec) {
139            requireNonNull(type, "type is null");
140            requireNonNull(codec, "codec is null");
141            codecMap.put(QualifiedType.of(type), codec);
142
143            return this;
144        }
145
146        /**
147         * Add a codec for a {@link GenericType}.
148         */
149        public Builder addCodec(final GenericType<?> type, final Codec<?> codec) {
150            requireNonNull(type, "type is null");
151            requireNonNull(codec, "codec is null");
152            codecMap.put(QualifiedType.of(type.getType()), codec);
153
154            return this;
155        }
156
157        public CodecFactory build() {
158            return factory.apply(codecMap);
159        }
160    }
161
162}
